document_data.name: Dickon Sharken
document_data.mainbody: '''Dickon Sharken''' was a skilled mercenary who lived in the city of [[Pyarados]] in [[Thay]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He nearly reported observations of his varied encounters to the region's [[tharchion]], [[Valerios Theokillos]].
document_data.Description: Dickon was known as a particularly vicious, even sadistic, individual, traits that led to high recommendations from those who retained his services. He followed directions exceptionally well and carried his own in combat.
document_data.History: The cruel mercenary traveled to Thay when he was a teenager, and has traveled through the [[Sunrise Mountains]] a number of times by the year [[1357 DR]].
